caption.text:
Tequila Beets
-
1.5 oz Blanco Tequila
.75 oz Lemon Juice
.5 oz Cream Sherry
6 Raspberries
1 oz fresh Beet Juice
.75 oz Simple Shrup
-
Muddle fruit in container with other ingredients, shake and double strain through fine mesh. Garnish with raspberry sugar.
-
Spotted on @clandestine_cocktails
-
Tag a friend you would love to share this delicious drink with!
-
Follow @artofdrinks for more beautiful cocktails üç∏
